marker.ph: /// return the current state of AI ...

/// Function for checking if the AI is moving (used for setting the animation) ...

/* AimContext = gameObject.GetComponent<AIMContext>(); ... */
/// Method called by Micheal when the IA enter in the danger zone ...
/// TO DO ...
/// Set the stat to run if the current state is normal or panic ...
/// Called when we do a tap movement on the hologram, this function will call OnSelect(); ...
/// When a IA ENTER in the collider, say him he is in danger ...
/// When a IA IS in the collider, say him he is in danger ...
/// set the state of the target to run, used in the custom action script ...
/// When we do the tap movement on a hologram ...
/// set the state to run if he is not saved ...
/// Stop the movement of the AI and call the methode SayRassuring ...
/// return the current state of AI ...
